content: your hook into the space between the two last spikes from the first star yarn over and pull through there will be three loops on your hook insert your hook into the same stitch where you worked the last stitch of the previous star yarn over and pull through there will now be four loops on your hook insert your hook into the next stitch yarn over and pull through repeat in the next stitch this will give you six loops on your hook chain one to close the second star repeat the steps above to make stars all the way across the row when you get to the end make one half_double_crochet in the last stitch row 2 turn the work and chain 2 this counts as the first half_double_crochet stitch of the row crochet one half_double_crochet stitch into the eye of the star in the row below work 2 half_double_crochet in the eye of each star across the row when you get to the end crochet 1 half_double_crochet in the final stitch gauge 4 double crochets and 2 5 row of double crochets measure approx 1 inch the cardigan the body of the cardigan is worked in one piece starting with the yoke row 1 chain 55 1 double_crochet in the 4th chain from the hook 1 double_crochet in each chain to end turn 53 row 2 chain 3 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet *2dc in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 3 double_crochet* repeat from *to* to last 3 sts 2dc in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in last double_crochet 1 double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 66 row 3 chain 3 1 double_crochet in each double_crochet to end 1 double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 66 row 4 chain 3 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet *2dc in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in ech of the next 3 double_crochet* repeat from *to* to last 4 sts 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of next 2 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 82 row 5 as row 3 row 6 chain 3 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet *2dc in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of the next 2 double_crochet* repeat from*to* to lat 2 sts 2 double_crochet in double_crochet 1 double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 109 row 7 as row 3 k a m e crochet designs 2018 by krisztina anna matejcsok-edomer all rights reserved row 8 work as row 6 145 row 9 divide for armholes chain 3 1 double_crochet in each of the next 22 double_crochet skip 26 double_crochet armhole 1 double_crochet in each of the next 47 double_crochet skip 26 double_crochet armhole 1 double_crochet in each of the next 22 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in top of chain 3 turn 93 row 10 chain 3 1 fpdc in all sts to end turn 93 row 11 first row of star stitch see the notes above turn 46 stars row 12 second row of
